channel.description: Mina talks all things football with her unique brand of humor and insight. Her friends join each episode to talk about the NFL's latest storylines along with her football loving dog, Lenny, making frequent contributions.

item.title: A Dub for Chubb
item.description: Mina Kimes and Domonique Foxworth talk some of the big trades on NFL Trade Deadline Day including Chase Claypool to the Bears, T.J. Hockenson to the rival Vikings & Bradley Chubb to the Dolphins. Plus, they recap MNF between the Bengals and Browns and talk about Jacoby Brissett’s surprising performance as QB1. They also give their Winners and Woofs for Week 8, show some love for Jimmy G, Christian McCaffrey, and the Eagles. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Fields of Dreams
item.description: Mina Kimes & Domonique Foxworth recap a surprising MNF between the Bears and Patriots. Plus, they give their Winners and Woofs for Week 7! They dive into the quarterback controversy in New England between Bailey Zappe & Mac Jones. And is it finally time to consider the Bears relevant? Plus, they give the Chiefs offense some love & as well as the Commanders after they hand the Packers their third straight loss. And speaking of the Packers, Mina and Domonique talk about the struggling Aaron Rodgers, but also Tom Brady. Which one has the better chance of turning their season around? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Turn On The Jets
item.description: The Mina Kimes Show featuring Lenny: Mina Kimes and Domonique Foxworth recap Monday Night Football between the Chargers and Broncos. Are we being too hard on Russell Wilson? Plus, they give their Winners & Woofs for Week 6, including surprising performances by the Jets and Giants defensive lines, and the Vikings - who are now 5-1. But what’s going on with Tom Brady and the Buccaneers? They might still be okay in the NFC, but the Cardinals offense is in serious trouble. Learn more about your ad choices. item.title: Mahomes Alone
item.description: Mina Kimes and Domonique Foxworth recap Monday Night Football between the Chiefs & Raiders. What do they think about the controversial roughing the passer call? Plus, they give their Winners & Woofs for Week 5! Brian Daboll is making his case for Coach of the Year as the Giants are now 4-1 to start the season after beating the Packers in London. Plus, John Harbaugh makes all the right calls in Week 5 to earn himself a spot on the winner’s list. And on the other side, they react to Matt Rhule’s firing while still being owed $40 million. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: The Team Draft
item.description:
The Fourth Annual Team Draft makes its triumphant return. Mina and Mike Golic, Jr. draft NFL teams based on the following scoring system:
1 point for each regular season win 5 points for making the playoffs 5 points for making the divisional round 10 points for making the conference championship game 10 points for making the Super Bowl 5 points for winning the Super Bowl Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: THE THIRD ANNUAL TEAM DRAFT
item.description:
The Third Annual Mina Kimes Show Draft returns with Mina and Mike Golic, Jr. drafting all 32 NFL teams, getting deep into the strategy of the game and reviewing last season’s draft. A champion will be crowned based on the following scoring system:
1 point for each win
5 points for making the playoffs
5 points for making the divisional round
10 points for making the conference championship game
10 points for making the Super Bowl
5 points for winning the Super Bowl
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Slapshot, Meet Smile: Inside the Craziest Job in Sports - The NHL Dentist
item.description: Pucks to the mouth. Teeth flying to the ice. Hockey players aren't known for their perfect smiles. But have you ever wondered who exactly comes to the rescue mid-game, after a player takes a slapshot to the teeth, and gets them back on the ice? Enter the world of NHL dentists - the brave heroes who put hockey players' notorious grins back together. ESPN writer Dave Fleming takes Mina Kimes on a gory, grueling journey of mouth molds, chiclets, emergency surgery, and more tales of dental hockey horror. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.itunes:subtitle: Mina and Louis Riddick discuss getting sassy on social media dealing with keyboard tough guys (2:21), Russell Wilson's new contract and whether or not you can win while paying a QB that much (7:28), how many QBs deserve to go in the first round (31:16),
item.itunes:summary: Mina and Louis Riddick discuss getting sassy on social media dealing with keyboard tough guys (2:21), Russell Wilson's new contract and whether or not you can win while paying a QB that much (7:28), how many QBs deserve to go in the first round (31:16), why more top QBs don't pull an Eli Manning (37:49), and how the draft teaches us about both trends in the NFL and the sliding scale of positional importance (43:50). item.content:encoded:
Mina and Louis Riddick discuss getting sassy on social media dealing with keyboard tough guys (2:21), Russell Wilson's new contract and whether or not you can win while paying a QB that much (7:28), how many QBs deserve to go in the first round (31:16), why more top QBs don't pull an Eli Manning (37:49), and how the draft teaches us about both trends in the NFL and the sliding scale of positional importance (43:50).

item.title: We Will We Will Mock You
item.description: Mina and ESPN's Joel Anderson go back and forth to create a mock draft of who NFL teams should select later this month in Nashville. Joel tells us which prospect looks like Meek Mill, the player that doesn't have a face for greatness, and why a prospect's last name is giving him a boost. Mina suggests that Mountain Time is inconsiderate, says that a player has planetary upside, and rotates through a series of phrases like "pro ready", "plug and play", and "day one starter", which all mean the same thing. Plus, Mina chats with former Washington safety Taylor Rapp about his preparation for the draft. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
